data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Bristol City with the kick-off.
Bristol City take a 1-0 lead thanks to Jamie Paterson.
In the minute 13, Gustavo Hamer (Coventry) has received a yellow card from John Brooks.
At Ashton Gate, Tommy Rowe has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The away team have replaced Liam Kelly with Jordan Shipley. This is the first substitution made today by Mark Robins.
In the minute 33, Goal! Matt Godden levels the match at 1-1.
It's Coventry with the kick-off after the break.
In the minute 52, Zak Vyner (Bristol City) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Bristol City make their first substitution with Chris Martin replacing Famara Diedhiou.
Dean Holden is making the team's second substitution at Ashton Gate with Tyreeq Bakinson replacing Han-Noah Massengo.
In the minute 60, Mark Robins (Coventry) is making a second substitution, with Ben Sheaf replacing Gustavo Hamer.
Tyler Walker is on a sub for Jamie Allen for Coventry.
The home team replace Nahki Wells with Antoine Semenyo.
In the minute 82, Goal! Bristol City have taken a 2-1 lead courtesy of a header from Tomas Kalas.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
